data.name: NERF Legends - Rex-Rampage Pack
data.detailed_description: Take a major bite out of your opponents with the NERF DinoSquad Rex-Rampage blaster and custom suit featuring awesome T-Rex detailing.  Load out with this King of the Dinos blaster and suit in both single player and multiplayer modes. The blaster and suit each come with 4 additional skin variations to customize your T-Rex-look! Upon downloading these items, they will be available from the customization menu.
data.about_the_game: Take a major bite out of your opponents with the NERF DinoSquad Rex-Rampage blaster and custom suit featuring awesome T-Rex detailing.  Load out with this King of the Dinos blaster and suit in both single player and multiplayer modes. The blaster and suit each come with 4 additional skin variations to customize your T-Rex-look! Upon downloading these items, they will be available from the customization menu.
data.short_description: Take a major bite out of your opponents with the NERF DinoSquad Rex-Rampage blaster and custom suit which can be used in both single player and multiplayer modes.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows
  • Processor: Core i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Core i7 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
